system.description: If you are actively patrolling your territory when time passes—or at the start of the game—roll with BLOOD.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: On a miss, or if you aren’t attending to your territory, things go south and your troubles are fast and furious.

weak-hit.label: Weak Hit
weak-hit.value: On a 7-9, one of your troubles surfaces (your choice), along with an opportunity to address it.

strong-hit.label: Strong Hit
strong-hit.value: On a 10+, your territory is secure and trouble is at a minimum; take +1 ongoing when you hit the streets in your territory.
